channel.title: music on Coffee now
channel.description: Recent content in music on Coffee now

item.title: Haste to the wedding: the musical interlude
item.description: Amongst the hasty planning of our wedding, it occurred to us that I could provide a musical interlude on the tin whistle that I’ve been learning to play over the last 18 months or so. I was initially a bit hesitant about this (can we say reluctant…)

item.title: Jiganuary
item.description: For the past year, I’ve been learning to play the tin whistle from a starting point of very little musical experience. I’m hoping to write more about that process in a future post, but here I’m focusing on my most recent efforts practicing some jigs during January. Hence ‘jiganuary’.
